messages.subject: TOTALLY OT: Oliver Stone's "Alexander"
messages.msgSnippet: I know there are some other fans of Alexander the Great here and fans of history in general, so I thought I d pass along this info since I just alerted my
messages.messageBody:
I know there are some other fans of Alexander the Great here and fans of history in general, so I thought I'd pass along this info since I just alerted my Hephaistion list. I accidentally stumbled upon it when RealPlayer opened so I could play a CD while I work. Such a nice surprise, but what a wait I have!

Release of Oliver Stone's Alexander film (there are two coming out... the other by the director of "Moulin Rouge") is set for November 5, 2004. There's a trailer available on the official site:
http://www.alexanderthemovie.com

Stars Colin Farrell as Alexander. With Anthony Hopkins, Angelina Jolie, Val Kilmer, and Jared Leto as Hephaistion.

phil (who's still philalexandros despite being stranded in Meiji Japan)
